posts.post_content:
I know some of you have them.... and I want them...

Please send scans and asking prices to:  

[url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url]

Rube admitted he autographed your cards here....

[URL="https://picasaweb.google.com/lh/photo/trpGmxRMq2oyhWhPmvO8rYRT3dysq2WPtX5u9gk-z0Y?feat=embedwebsite"][IMG]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-y2AffifrmzQ/S9G3Cun-nhI/AAAAAAAAH1Y/mnSRdlTSW-8/s800/MarquardIndex.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Rube's admission of signing a lot of cards is a great piece. Your growing collection continues to amaze. Great stuff.
LOL where did you get that?

[quote name="calvindog" post=927204]I love this.

[URL="http://www.flickr.com/photos/calvindog/2924877120/"][IMG]http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3072/2924877120_1395b57dfb_o.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/QUOTE]

I love that also as well.... Do you own it?  Where can I get one!?
I got it in a group of autographs from an auction house about 5-6 years ago.  Hilarious autograph.
Thanks for sharing that Mr. L!

[quote name="calvindog" post=927204]I love this.

[URL="http://www.flickr.com/photos/calvindog/2924877120/"][IMG]http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3072/2924877120_1395b57dfb_o.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/QUOTE]

How great would this look framed with 15 autographed cards of Rube.

[quote name="MacDice" post=927422]How great would this look framed with 15 autographed cards of Rube.[/QUOTE]

That could take honors for Piece of the Year...
